statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, last_updated FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level IN ('admin', 'supervisor') ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT permission_level, user_id FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control = TRUE ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, access_control FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level IN ('admin', 'editor', 'viewer') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_level > 3;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id WHERE permissions.permission_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_permissions > 1;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE user_id < 10 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM Roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT permission_name FROM Permissions WHERE permission_id > 5 ORDER BY permission_name;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM Users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT role_name FROM Roles JOIN Users ON Roles.role_id = Users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN Roles ON Users.user_id = Roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name IN ('Admin', 'Editor', 'Viewer');
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT p.permission_name, r.role_name, r.description FROM permissions p JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id JOIN roles r ON rp.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 2, 3)

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id INNER JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id
